Name: Burg
About the game: Burg is a First-Person Multiplayer Hide and Seek! Both teams are equipped with a set of abilities they can use to evade/capture the other. When a hider is caught they join the seeker until only one player remains victorious!
Meta Title: Burg: Jul 2022, Barji and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Burg? Check out the release date (Jul 2022), developer insights from Barji, and a complete game summary.
